# removeAll()

**Instance Method**

Removes all components from the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func removeAll()
```

## Updating the set

- **set(_:)**: Adds a new component to the set, or overrides an existing one.
- **set(_:)**: Adds multiple components to the set, overriding any existing components of the same type.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes the component of the specified type from the collection.
